name: Sifting (nomalles)
description:
Sifting is a game where you must search through waves of plant life in order to find the cube. The cube is slightly camouflaged, so watch the color changes in the plants to help.

This game is actually a VR game for Google Cardboard on iPhone, so I put this together to make it more accessible.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2017 in Hong Kong !

*CONTROLS*

_ walk into a cube to go to that environment _ use the mouse to navigate _
